english.title: The Ever-Providing
text: Oh God, you are the creator
Your wisdom shows in your servants' hearts
Kind words are a good deed,
Smiling to others is a good deed
Honest words are a good deed
and having a pure soul is a good deed
True religion is about how you treat others
This was my first lesson of dictation
that I learned from the book

Oh beautiful, your hair is like the Night
And your eyes are two stars
Let's stay up all night and sing

I swear with all I have

arabic.title: Khalina Neshoufak (خلینا نشوفك)
text: ده أنا و حیاتک کل ما أشوفک
لو فات یوم من غیر یا حبیبی ما أقابلک فیه
عینی تقوللی ازای کده ما ندورش علیه
قلبی یلومنی یقوللی أنا و انت عایشین لیه
ببقى معاک لکنی لشوقی بأقول ده خیال

english.title: Let me see you
text: Don´t leave me, even if they were secunds
If I was absence, so wait for me.
I swear to you, everytime I see you
I dream about the next time, I will see you
Let me see you, me and my eyes.
Let me see you, my love
If the day gone by, without seeing you
My eyes tell me, why can´t we look att her.
My heart keen me, saying to me why me and you still alive.
Stay with you, but in my thoughts i say that is imagination.
And I dream that I could tell more than could be told.
The one who loves you, will not relax in all life.

english.title: The Tune of Deprivation
text: you keep singing the tune of deprivation1
And you keep complaining and exaggerating
What you've been through in the earlier days didn't matter to you
Nor the sweet times we had back then
I hurt you? You are capable of hurting an entire town
What's this, did you think that you bought me?
I'll leave you and lose you forever
The only thing remaining was for you to kill me
We are done, goodbye, our separation will last
I've heard them a lot, I'm used to them
They no longer have meaning, it's done

english.title: My Fire (Oh, Lover)
text: Longing in my heart is a fire
And the distance and yearning are bitter
Oh my love, I swear your eyes are beautiful
Oh my love, I would sacrifice my life for you
Even my heart calls for you
Longing in my heart is a fire
And the distance and yearning are bitter
My heart took me and went far away
And it was born for you once again
Every word that I said, I have lived it
I kept saying it and repeating it
Oh my love, I swear your eyes are beautiful
Oh my love, I would sacrifice my life for you
Even my heart calls for you

And the distance and yearning are bitter

and that your absence is torment...

english.title: You can talk
text: Now you can talk about yourself
We always lived together as one soul but
now it’s over we became two souls.
And tomorrow we would say it was a memory
And we had fun for a few days.
You have changed my emotions and feelings
You let me live beside you and far
I suffered from you and I walked with you
And tomorrow we would say it was a memory
And we had fun for a few days .
Now you can talk about yourself
We always lived together as one soul but
now it’s over we became two souls.

text: و احنا سوا ف نص الطريق

english.title: Sorry
text: The dream never ends for us
No matter how much we grow,
The beating of our hearts must live on
Once upon a time love and us used to be
Then why did we go away?
And why does affection not last anymore?
Why would you be unjust to an innocent newborn?
Why would you wound a daring dream?
Why would our hands get separated
when we are in the middle of the road

arabic.title: آه حبيبي
text: ولا عايز اعيش غير وانا وياه
وانا يعني هداري واخاف من ايه

english.title: Ah, My beloved (Ah Habibi)
text: No one can fill my eyes except my beloved one1
and I don't want to live except with her
Life becomes sweeter2 when she is with me3
and with her I feel heart peace
"My beloved", Ah, "My beloved", and (here I'm saying) once more "My beloved"
"My beloved". And here I say it again. (her name), the sweetest of all names
I always say: "Oh, God"4 every time once I hear her name.
When I was asked5 about you I said: (she is) my beloved
What is here to be feared or hidden?
I swear by your intimacy that I found my eye (unwillingly)
disclosing (out loud) all what I was hiding
"My beloved", Ah, "My beloved", and (here I'm saying) once more "My beloved"
"My beloved". And here I say it again. (her name) the sweetest of all names
I always say: "Oh, God" every time once I hear her name.

english.title: The Embrace of the Mountain
text: In a day when the sun is up
I will hold your hands and take you
In the embrace of the mountain
I was born in this house
And I grew on its threshold
my first song that is warm
like the hearts of the girls
And the innocent colors on the doors of our homes
that are on the wall telling a tale
In the embrace of the mountain
And the waves of the Nile awaken
And tell tales of their memories
And I am a little child
That I am present and memory
In a day when the sun is up
I will hold your hands and take you
In the embrace of the mountain
Whispering to the beauty that is etched in stone
It remained alive in my features
in my conscience and in my smile
And in my love for life
In a day when the sun is up
I will hold your hands and take you
In the embrace of the mountain
I was born in this house
And I grew on its threshold
my first song that is warm
like the hearts of the girls
And the innocent colors on the doors of our homes
that are on the wall telling a tale
In the embrace of the mountain

arabic.title: أحلف بالليالي
text: مشيت في سكة م الأماني معاك

english.title: I Swear Upon the Nights
text: And your eyes, oh precious one
I don't know what happened to me
And what my story with you is
I found myself under your love's spell
I walked down a path of wishes with you
And your eyes, oh precious one
I don't know what happened to me
And what my story with you is
Oh why did I get myself entangled with passion again?
I had forgotten it and it had almost forgotten me
With a word of love, I fell in love
And I found passion in your eyes again
And your eyes, oh precious one
I don't know what happened to me
And what my story with you is
My feelings about you when I am with you
need more than a thousand stories
It is something that is felt
Through a word or a laugh2
And your eyes, oh precious one
I don't know what happened to me
And what my story with you is

english.title: Prettier
text: As time goes by I see you prettier but tonight you're prettier than ever, OH how magical
Oh my love, I'm more jealous now, my love
Come closer, all eyes are on you tonight, you who drove us crazy
I'll start my day with you and it will be a beautiful world, my love
Forget about this world and stay in my arms tonight, you who drove us crazy

english.title: better and better
text: Every time you beautify in my eyes, except better and better.
The jealousy in my heart has increased.
All the eyes of the night are on you.
that will, oh that will, make us crazy!
And the world will stay beautiful for me.
and leave your soul in my bosom tonight.**
that will, oh that will, make us crazy!

arabic.title: أحلي يا دنيا
text: عمر الحب ما عاش في قساوة

english.title: Life, You are Sweeter
text: When will we see a sweet smile
When will we share together a precious song
And fill the universe with loyalty?
When will we live without sadness?
When will we see harshness turn to tenderness?
Oh life, you are sweeter when you are safe
And when I find that people are loving each other
Why is it that there is safety and also doubt in your hearts?
Keep the roses and remove the thorns
You never forget and your eyes give it away
Sing the pure songs of love
How sweet is the beautiful warm song
If we give it hope and space

english.title: here i returned back to you
text: you called with longing,i called back
you told me to come, i came
i wont reproach you of what happened
here i returned back to you
here i am in front of you
tell them that you are not the one who called first
he missed me and came back
i wont stay away from you again
tell your heart to listen to me
not its tears that brought me back
longing will have brought me back
you are my most beautiful memory
you are more precious than my life

arabic.title: أشوف عنيكي
text: أنا أشوف شعورك مفرودين تحت القمر
و القاني عايز أروح اليكي وأعتذر
أنا أشوف عينيكي تروح اشارة للمنى
تنده عليكي من الإنتظار مليون سنة
عنيكي زي دوالي قلبي اللي انكوى
أنا أشوف اشوفك ابقى غير ما كنت أنا
عملالي ايه بس انتي وأنا مش من هنا
انتي اللي خليتي الحياة ميلة الهوى

english.title: to see your eyes
text: I see your feelings (1) lying under the moon
and the Nile infront of me washing people's sorrows
and find myself want to go to you and apologize
your feelings r waves (2) drifting us both
I see your eyes going as a sign for wishes (3)
calling you to wait for million years
being apart didn't make her forget the humms
your eyes r like the burns (4) in my heart that have burned
I see your lips ready for loyalty
and forget those who patrayed me and be fulled by clarity
and feel nothing but my soul flying
when I see you I become something else
what are you doing to me and I'm not from here!!
are u accepting the foreignness of a heart of an insured soul
you're the one who made life full of passion

arabic.title: أغيب
text: دا انا يا شوق فيا اللي فيه

english.title: I Stay Away
text: And say: By now she has forgotten me
Well, If she'd forget me, I'd be able to forget her
As long as she still remembers..
Why do you think I am asking in the first place..?
There's too much for me to hide
Oh passion, the same that's going on with her is going on with me
I am doing much worse than her
Worse than what happened to her happened to me
And say: By now she has forgotten me
Well, If she'd forget me, I'd be able to forget her
As long as she still remembers..
Why do you think I am asking in the first place..?

english.title: Happy Times
text: And become joyous in our eyes
Oh the night of hope is so prolific
Oh the night of hope is so prolific
Our night asked, how's it going?
Oh night, whenever we are attracted to someone
We're only attracted to someone beautiful

arabic.title: أفريقيا
text: For all the games to start

english.title: Africa
text: For all the games to start
Through love we have become united
And the world will hear us
And tonight is the first night of our feasts
Here is the path of our glory
And here is Cairo and here is our country
Through love we have become united
And the world will hear us
And tonight is the first night of our feasts
Here is the path of our glory
And here is Cairo and here is our country

arabic.title: ألومك ليه
text: ايديك دى كأن اخر مرة حمسكها
و انا بايديا ايه وانا اتحمل
اكيد انت و انا كان نفسنا نكمل
محدش داري ايه مكتوب لنا بكرا

english.title: why to blame on you?
text: Baby, I should blame my soul and not forgive it
Because on front of my eyes a fact I do ignore it
It's like it's the last time to touch your hands
Cares about the thing when he owns it?
Non of us kept his promise
Non of us was afraid of separation
Non of us kept his promise
Non of us was afraid of separation
And we aren't appreciating each other's value
We became strangers to each other
And what's on my hand? ,tell me, and I'll bear
What to tell you? Sure, you and I wanted to continue
Beautiful things will turn into memories
Who knows what will happen tomorrow?

english.title: I Besought You
text: to pass my greetings to the nights of our love
We miss the most beautiful days
I made you swear by my life and with all that's precious;
Bring me back to live the sweetest nights
They are on my mind and that goes without saying
The passion made my night longer
And I always remember you and say
that you will return again. It is not possible
that I would forget you one day and that you would forget me
I tell tales of your love
I never ever said that it is something gone in the past
And even in the hardest of times
I say that I miss our days
Life distracts, it steals [days] from you
and my eyes long for you to be close
and for us to speak on and on
Forgetting you requires a strong will
and my heart weakens as usual
It loves you exaggeratedly and passion increases

english.title: Amentak
text: I'm asking you a favor to remember our lovely nights, I miss the most wonderful days.
I'm asking you to make me live most wonderful nights again, I still remember without doubt.
Longing make no end to my night and I always remember you and say, You will be back again it's impossible to forget each other.
I tell stories about our love, Never said it was end, And even through the hardest times I still miss our days.
Life take us away and my eyes missing you around and telling you again, It's hard to get over you.
I'm weak and like each time I fail to forget you and even love you more.
Longing make no end to my night and I always remember you and say, You will be back again it's impossible to forget each other.
I tell stories about our love, Never said it was end, And even through the hardest times I still miss our days.

english.title: I am Free
text: I am free to fly and to soar
I am full of determination, passion and life
In your harsh carved out street
Oh, your eyes have my address wrong1
Oh your hearts have nothing to do with emotions
We came for you but we found
People who live to hurt others

english.title: I am different
text: I told you that I am diferent
From everything that you went through
And you'll feel a big difference
And little by little, my love, you will trust me my love
And you'll love those nights spent with me
And in this night, come on
How many lives will we have?
There is nothing other than that to be said, I am different
And I say what I say with proof
Come to be loved so much
There is nothing other than that to be said, I am different
I am not within any expectations

english.title: I'm different
text: I told you I'm different than all you knew before
My soul, my touch, I'm different
And bit by bit my love
You will trust me my love
And adore my nights my love
How many times will we live?
How many times will we live?
And I'm saying it with proof
If you come, you'll be loved handsomely

english.title: I'm Different
text: I told you that I'm different
You will feel a great difference
You will be trust me, baby
I'm different from them, I swear by God
How many times will you live, my dear?
I'm different from them, I swear by God
How many times will you live, my dear?
There's nothing to say, I'm different
And I say it for proving
Come to love a great love

arabic.title: أنا مش أناني
text: ان النهارده بقى في حياتي حد تاني
كنت هفضل كل ده مستني ايه؟
حب ايه اللي انت بتدور عليه؟
بعد الغياب ده مفيش عتاب اتهز ليه
مين اللي قالك الحياه وقفت في يوم
كنت هفضل كل ده مستني ايه؟
حب ايه اللي انت بتدور عليه؟
بعد الغياب ده مفيش عتاب اتهز ليه

english.title: I'm no selfish
text: I had let you live your life as you wanted1
and been waiting for you for years
What should I have been waiting for for this long?
Which love are you seeking for?
After such absence, such blame will shake me not a bit.
you know well how to do this6
Your wounds are not to be healed
What should I have been waiting for for this long?
Which love are you seeking for?
After such absence, such blame will shake me not a bit.

english.title: I'm not selfish
text: I let you live your life after us
and I stood still for years waiting for you
Don't blame me, starting today I have someone else in my life
What have I been waiting for all this time?
What love are you looking for now?
after leaving me, no admonition is going to shake me
Because your place is now filled with someone else
your eyes and heart are jealous, you can't take it
forget me if you still remember me, you have a million ways to do it!

Who told you that life would ever stop because of those who walk away!?

arabic.title: أنا وانت
text: أَنَا وَاُنْتُ إختارنا إِنَّنَا نُبْعِدُ عَنْ بَعْضُ خلاصِ
يَبِقَا مالوش لاَزِمَهُ يُبَانُ ضِعْفُي وَضِعْفَكَ لِلْنَاسِ
وياريت إللي يجيبلك سَيْرَتَي قولَ كَانَ حَبيبُي
وَأَنَا هثبت لِيَهِمُ بِطْريقَتُي أَنْ الْحكاِيَّةَ خلاصِ
عادي أهي خلصت زي ما كل حكاية بتخلص
ايه اللي هيجرى وايه اللي هينقص منا لو أحنا مكملناش
أنا هتعود وانت كمان لازم تتعود عمر البعد ما كان بيموت
أَنَا هفضل يا حَبيبَي أَفَتَكِرُكَ عَمَرَي مَا هنساك
وَلَا هنسى الأيام الْحلْوَةَ اللي كَانَتْ وياك
أَنَا عايزك بَسْ تَكَوُّنَ عَارِفِ بِبُعْدِ وَقلبَي معاك
أنا هفضل يا حبيبي أفتكرك عمري ما هنساك
ولا هنسى الأيام الحلوة اللي كانت وياك
أنا عايزك بس تكون عارف ببعد وقلبي معاك
عَادُي أَهِي خَلَّصَتْ زِيُّ مَا كُلَّ حِكَايَةَ بِتَخَلُّصِ
ايه اللي هيجرى وايه اللي هينقص مَنَّا لَوْ أَحّْنَا مكملناش
أَنَا هتعود وَاُنْتُ كَمَانَ لاَزِمِ تَتَعَوَّدُ عُمَرُ الْبُعْدِ مَا كَانَ بيموت

cause the distant would never ever end

كلك حيرة وشاغل بالك كله يرتاح ويشغلي هواه

لو كل حبيب له حبيب ودة حاله كان جاله كدة وغنى
حفضل أحبك أحبك أحبك ولا عمري حقول على فين يا هوى
ولا أحلامي في دنيا حبك كان قلبي يقول نحلمها سوى
لو كل حبيب له حبيب ودة حاله كان جاله كدة وغنى

where me love is taking me
my dreams in the world of your love

now it's not permitted for anyone to look at you

english.title: Yes, I've changed
text: I haven't been talking about myself nor about how I feel nor my torture and if ever your name came up, I've not been saying she's my love.
I hear your name and I don't bother. Also I haven't been thinking about you nor have been regretting our time together. Nothing like before anymore.
Yes, I've changed. Nothing ever stays the same. I'm not talking less of you. It's just those times I don't like remembering them.
Those who walk away from my life, I would never get back together with. I'd always find them out of the picture. No matter what they say, I won't listen.
At the end I just want my own comfort. I don't want to waste my time. I want to live it comfortably with someone who would fulfill my dreams.*

english.title: I love you I hate you
text: Ahibbak Akrahik  ( I love you I hate you)
Should I love you or hate you?
Leave you or call for you?
Should I get hooked on you?
Or what should I do with you?
Should I love you or hate you?
Leave you or call for you?
Should I get hooked on you?
Or what should I do with you?
Should I embrace you or push you away?
My feelings for you are strange.
Ehsasi da momken yehid gabal, yedaya.
My feelings can destroy mountains, completely.
Bein hobi leeki we korhi leeki, kheit rofaya.
Between my love for you and my hate for you, is a thin line.
La el orb mertahlo, wala el baad aadar aleih.
I am not at ease while close to you, and I can't stand to be away.
Hagat ghariba bahesaha wana bein edeiki.
I fell strange things when I am between your arms.
Kiteer bakhaf meneik wekiteer bakhaf aleiki.
I fear you at times and sometimes I worry about you.
La el orb mertahlo, wala el baad aadar aleih.
I am not at ease while close to you, and I can't stand to be away.

I deceive you, I promise you
I do not feel secure with it
This feeling of mine can destroy a mountain, lose things
Between my love for you and my hate for you is a fine thread
Neither am I content with closeness
Nor can I bear the distance

Our Moon is missing your glare

Who told you to forget us?
You who threw us into patience sorrowful
Our Moon is missing your glare

arabic.title: اصلها بتفرق
text: شفت الجنه في عنيها ازاى اسيبها واعيش فى النار

حبها في قلبي ودي اجمل واحده
ملقتش جمالها في ولا واحده والله ملهاش بديل
اصلها بتفرق في الشوق والوحده في حياتي
وهي هنا معايا الدنيا بحالها مبتسعنيش
اصلها بتفرق وانا روحي في واحده وبفكر ليل ونهار فيها

اصلها بتفرق وانا عاشق واحده وبحب ودايب في هواها
اصلها بتفرق من واحده لواحده فيه واحده بتنساها بواحده

So i gave up & my heart choose
I saw heaven in her eyes, So how could i leave her and live in hell !
It does really matter, In your life

You will find  that she doesn't have a replacement

Her love is in my heart and she is the most beautiful one
and i couldn't find her beauty in anyone else.and I swear on God's name ,she doesn't have a replacement

In my life and when she is with me,The life doesn't fill me

and the longing* is increasing, it* doesn't end

And i give (or said hi but give is more right) and my heart chosed
I saw the heaven in her eye, how will i let her go and live in hell

See her with you that cant be replased

I havent founed her beauty in noone else and in allah's name there isnt a replasment for her

arabic.title: اعمل ايه

arabic.title: اغلى من عمري
text: شوفت كتير حوليّ ما شوفتش الا عينيك
كل ما تيجي في عينيّ بقرب اكتر ليك
تبعد عني انا غصبا عني بفكر فيك
ترجع ليا حبيبي بغمض عيني عليك
يا ما ليالي وانت يا غالي
يا ما ليالي دايما في بالي
يا ما ليالي شاغل خيالي وما سبتنيش
ده حبيبي, حبيبي اغلى من عمري
انت في قلبي ودايما قلبي بيجري عليك
اول ما اسمع صوتك بنسى الدنيا معاك
ما اتخيلتش فرحة قلبي لما الاقيك
وما صدقتش غير دلوقتي وانا وياه
يا ما ليالي وانت يا غالي
يا ما ليالي دايما في بالي
يا ما ليالي شاغل خيالي وما سبتنيش
ده حبيبي, حبيبي اغلى من عمري

english.title: More Precious Than My Life

Every time our eyes meet I get closer to you
When you are far from me, I can't help but think about you
When you come back to me, darling, I close my eyes over you
So many nights, you, my precious
So many nights you were always on my mind
So many nights you occupied my imagination and didn't leave me
That's my darling, my darling is more precious than my life
I swear, more precious than my life

Oh God, God is the greatest
when it comes to wisdom and insight
Oh God, you are the most forgiving

Make us of your kind servants

Its step is a long path in my heart

no matter how optimistic or pessimistic we are

But as much as I dream,
the feeling of longing when you are close is more bearable
than our separation even for one night
A smile that paints tomorrow for me as a laugh
And in the days that are full of blame
you are my road and my path
And throw me onto every idea
that creates means out of fear1

english.title: Cairo
text: As if she1  was a beautiful girl calling on you,
there is a secret that makes her always look beautiful in your eyes.
How magical she is! I adored her. I love her.
Cairo, her Nile, her long night,
her songs, her mawwals2  and her tales. how beautiful (they) are!
To Cairo you came, you long,
you love her, you can't forget her and you keep talking about her.
Here are such people who can take away your worries, or (at least) share it with you,
be with you in your happy moments and complement you.
Those people you miss when they leaveز. and they always remind you
with Cairo, her Nile, her long night,
her songs, her mawwals and her tales. how beautiful (they) are!
To Cairo you came, you long,
you love her, you can't forget her and you keep talking about her.
How beautiful she is at noon, in a felucca3  in in the Nile
with a nice group of people and a song about love and passion
for those are in love, in a deep passion and staying up all night long
Cairo, her Nile, her long night,
her songs, her mawwals and her tales. how beautiful (they) are!
To Cairo you came, you long,
you love her, you can't forget her and you keep talking about her.

english.title: The Past
text: Let's not talk about the past
The past was full of pain
And as long as I am happy with your love,
Why should you look for something that is gone?
Oh you are the most delicate angel
all its dreams because of your eyes
When I got to know her
And found out that she truly fell in love with me
And her love started to grow inside me
Oh you are the most delicate angel
all its dreams because of your eyes
My feeling is that her heart is in love
The closest person to her out of all people
And I built for her the most beautiful palace and home.

english.title: The City
text: The city's heart is crowded with burdens of sadness
Who cares for anything other than their own burdens?
Who screams out for anything but their own pain?
Tomorrow they will drip upon the crowds
And the crowdedness will become empty space
we will be begging with regret
upon the tales then were lost
stands amidst the winds of fate
hiding the fact that it is in danger

arabic.title: المصور
text: مع أن لكل واحد فينا شبه

english.title: The Fashioner
text: Oh God, you formed & fashioned everything

english.title: The Innocent Angel
text: There she is, the innocent angel
The one with such a kind heart
There she is, the one who used to be my everything
She was my night and my moon
She was my soul and my life
I handed her the reins of my life
While we were in the middle of the path

english.title: To forget a woman
text: Why do you, my heart, love a different woman everyday
and still, you can't find what you want in any of them
Every start of a day you say you found her
and at the end of the day I feel that you've forgotten her
This is all because you're hiding from the truth (literally 'escaping from the truth')
all of this, my heart, to forget a woman
any woman you meet can feel
that you're not there for her, you're there to forget
can you even love any one other than her?
even when you're with anyone else, you remember her
This is all because you're hiding from the truth (literally 'escaping from the truth')
all of this, my heart, to forget a woman
I said I'd forget, I said I'd never go back
What will you do now when you decide to go back?
Why did you make people believe you forgot her
while the truth is that you're still living for her
This is all because you're hiding from the truth (literally 'escaping from the truth')
all of this, my heart, to forget a woman

english.title: Remember me
text: You who with your beauty and your eyes tortures me.
And if your heart feels for mine one day then visit me.
You are, in my eyes, everything to me.
The joy of my youth and of this world.
The first time I saw you,
With one look I forgot my wounds.
Which made me forget those who were lost.
If I call it to return to me.
A whole life with you feels like a second.
You are, in my eyes, everything to me.
The joy of my youth and of this world.
Feels for mine one day then visit me.
You are, in my eyes, everything to me.
The joy of my youth and of this world.

the happiness of my youth and this world
ist time i saw u.... u've touched my heart with one look i forgot about its "his heart" injuries

u r in my eyes, everything i have
the happiness of my youth and this world

english.title: May You Be With Me
text: Which word is said on that day between two people?
Which word could equal the sweetness of the work you said to me
You said it again and my heart was flooded with affection
It's fire would go out my darling unless you kept it going
Do you know what you're doing to me with the world my darling
It's like the first time I've felt secure
May you be with me my darling no matter what
Oh dream of my life that has been in my imagination for so long
Do do you know what the most beautiful thing that makes one happy is?
That which you have dreamed for you found my darling
I lived dreaming of this moment
This that I've been searching for
And would leave my life and my world but I wouldn't leave you

english.title: Stay with me
text: No love words have ever been said between two people
Would equal the sweetness of a single word you said to me
Say it again and again, my heart is filled with longing
Its fire won't go out unless you keep repeating it my love
Do you know what the word ''my love'' does to me?
It's like someone is feeling safe for the first time
Stay with me, stay with me no matter what my love
Stay with me, you're the dream of my life from long time ago
Do you know what makes someone happy?
That all you've been dreaming of becomes your love
I've been dreaming of this moment, i've been looking for you
I leave all my life, my worlds and i'd never leave you
Do you know what the word ''my love'' does to me?
It's like someone is feeling safe for the first time
Stay with me, stay with me no matter what my love
Stay with me, you're the dream of my life from long time ago

i wont do my mistake again
my love, no matter how long i stayed in your lap

لما جيت و مليت حياتي يا حبيبي
كان في بالي دنيا حلوه عشت اجمل منها
نفسي اقولك كلمه اغلي من حبيبي
نعيش دنيا بالاحساس تكون هي جنتنا
خلي اللي بنا يطول دا وقت فرحتنا
قلبي وياك استريح و في ثواني صدقك
شاف معاك حبي و امان محلمش بيه
الكلام وياك يريح دا الي عرفك يعشقك

english.title: lets stay alone together
text: Today I've seen everything i dreamed about
when you came and filled my life my love
i was thinking about a beautiful life but i lived better than it
i wish i could tell u a word more dearly than ''my love''
lets stay alone and forget about people
to live a life full of sensation which it'll be our heaven
lets stay alone(together) like this forever
keep what we both have longer ..its out time
my heart felt comfortable with you and i believed in you in a seconds
''my heart'' seen with you love and secure that i never dreamed about before
talking with you make me feel good and who get to know you adores you
So what if he was someone who loves you (what can he do)
I heard every love word you said to me
you make me feel happy and assured and i sighed
who had the chance to love you would know that time
that what he lost in his life is you not what he already have

english.title: Coming back
text: Dare you to come back talking about us
asking why didn't we go on?
Just ask yourself who did hold on
and who did give up and let go 1
You lost. I was in your grasp but you lost me.
I can't forget what you said as a farewell,
how cruel were your heart and your look,
nor how I was begging you to stay
and you was giving no care at all.
Don't you really know why have I change
I'm walking away right now not to remember

english.title: Coming back (Literal translation)

and asking why we didn't go on
and who let go for no price
My answer will not be useful to you
You got lost and you lost me of your grasp
when they are no more needed
I didn't forget neither your farewell words
nor toughness of your heart and eyes
I was telling you to stay with me
but this didn't move you and I was ...........
So, you don't know why have I change!
I'm walking away because you remind me
with that wound you mad in me

and you wonder why  couldn't we go all the way

My reply to you won't get you anywhere
you got lost and you lost me
I didn't forget what you says about our goodby ,
your cold heart and your eyes
I  was  telling you to be by my side ,
don't be afraid , take it slow
so I don't know what has changed me?
I'm gonna walk away coz you remind me of
the hurt that I had to live with you

english.title: Soul of My Heart
text: There goes, one more day passed us
How many more days are there in our lifetime, my love!
When would we live (our lifetimes) together
Why are you, why, leaving me without (deprived of) you
I'm waiting while you're away from me
Afraid that would be gone from me,
Where are the days of the past, where are our nights!
Reassure my heart, tell (me) quickly, my love
I'm dreaming that what we had would return to us
What else is in my hands other than dreams!

english.title: My Soul
text: And I no one can ever come close to replacing you, my darling
And in your absence, passion has grown weary
And now days pass as if they are years for me
The flames of passion are in my heart
Nothing would calm them but the touch of your hand
And wherever could you find lovers like us,
Who see the world in the light of your eyes,
other than you and I together?
My darling, when is our separation going to come to an end?
And how could my eyes see dreams?
It is a shame if the nights of love are gone
And for our years to be wasted in absence and quarrels

it reminds me of you .. and of the beautiful days in my life

i crying without a voice ..in the middle of wishes ..

english.title: What Did you Do?
text: Oh time, what did you do
I used to have someone I loved
But they left me with tears and torture
After the longing and the years
Hope turned out to be fake
Where are my smile and my happiness,
Where are my heart and my lovers
or cry about the one who has gone away?

english.title: You Had Right
text: And come again to beat, my heart.
A lot we've said we would stay away
And other eyes call for us
And still we say: only her eyes
And come again to beat, my heart.
And what could we have done?
We were delivered by love to her hands
If once we tried to hide
Who ever was melt in love,
And that wouldn't appear on him?!
And come again to beat, my heart.

arabic.title: عندي سؤال
text: عمال تحلي في عيني و اقول
هو في كدا لا مش معقول
يرضيك خطفت قلبي و لا انا هنا
نفسي تبقي جمبي و من هنا

english.title: I Have a Question
text: I have a question and please answer it
What are you doing to me?
A feeling I've never felt before
Except when I am with you
You're getting sweeter in my eyes
And I say I am not worth it
Is the something as this it isn't believable
Does it satisfy you, stealing my heart
I melted in your sight and sweetness
I wish you'd always be beside me
The missings, if only they had limits
My heart is in love with you
It is always calling out for you
It's the most beautiful thing in our world
O my soul over you (literal translation)

arabic.title: عنواني
text: انا مش ممكن اعيش فى امبارح
بعد ما حبك بقى شئ واضح

english.title: My Address
text: And now I can return and love again
I am not used to living lonely
It is hard to love life one day
And what is harder than that is for you to find
Someone with the same tenderness as me
I wasted years of my life
between my dreams and my stories
But now that passion is at ease
There will be no more wounds in my heart
I can't live trapped in the past
After your love became something clear to me
And how can I return to being lonely,
When I am now in love again?

arabic.title: عودونى
text: عشت عمرى قبل منك يوم وما جيتلى تانى عشته كله فى يوم
عودونى عودونى عليك أحبك عودونى ... عودونى وعلمونى هواك
قلب واحد اللى حاسس بيك ... هو قلب العاشق اللى دايب فيك
عودونى عودونى عليك أحبك عودونى ... عودونى وعلمونى هواك
مش بخاطرى مش لاقيلى حلول ... غصب عنى عيونى عودتنى أقول
عودونى عودونى عليك أحبك عودونى ... عودونى وعلمونى هواك

english.title: Awedony عودونى
text: I lived my life before you a day
& when u returned to me again
I lived all my life in a day
they made me ... they made me love you .... they made me
they made me & learned me your love
only one heart that feel you
they made me ... they made me love you .... they made me
they made me & learned me your love
it is out of my control .... I can not find solutions
my eyes compel me & make me say
they made me ... they made me love you .... they made me
they made me & learned me your love

english.title: I Want You
text: Crack the door open and pass
My heart is a safe haven
Is an angel that I don't have
It has been lost for so long
For the sake of the thousand pains I suffered
How's this all going to end with you?
If it comes to love, I've loved you
If it comes to patience, I've been patient for years
If it comes to passion, I've held it for your eyes
If it comes to jealousy, I've been jealous about you

english.title: When My Eye Sees Her
text: It told me that my soul was in her
She is the love of my heart
I will tire myself so she can relax
It told me that my soul was in her
It told me that she is its love
So why would it leave her?
She is the love of my heart
I will tire myself so she can relax
It told me that my soul was in her
She is the love of my heart
I will tire myself so she can relax
She is the love of my heart
I give my life to her
It told me that my soul was in her
This is what’s on its mind
It told me that my soul was in her
It told me that my soul was in her

arabic.title: غني من قلبك
text: بحس بيها بين وجودي وبين شفايفي بتبتسم
بحبك انت انا هغني ولحبك انت انا هغني
قالت لي بالحب اقدر المس أي نجمة من هنا
كنت خايف انما في كلامها رنة من السما
بحس بيها بين وجودي وبين شفايفي بتبتسم
بحبك انت انا هغني ولحبك انت انا هغني
بحكيلكوا عنها وصدقوني في كل كلمة قولتها
هي الحقيقة اللي في خيالي وفي كل لحظة عشتها

english.title: Sing from your heart
text: Sing from your heart and mine
she talked to me and relieved my mind
i can feel her within me and in between my lips, smiling
I'll sing "i love you" and for your love i will sing
she said "i can reach for any star here cause of love"
i felt something wrong in what she's saying
and i stand here today and sing
no matter how this place separates us
Sing from your heart and mine
she talked to me and relieved my mind
i can feel her within me and in between my lips, smiling
I'll sing "i love you" and for your love i will sing
i'll talk to you about her and believe every word i say
is the truth in my mind and every moment i have lived
i hear her in every song
and see her in every thought
Sing from your heart and mine
she talked to me and relieved my mind

arabic.title: فوق من اللي انت فيه
text: فوق من الي انت فيه اعمل حاجه مستني ايه
عيد حساباتك يا حبيبي دا لو يهمك حبنا
مين بيحب مين دا احنا بقينا متغربين
لو مش خايف علي الي بيننا مش هخاف عليه انا
احنا فيها لسة فيها يلا غير نظرتي
و بأيديك تفضل حبيبي او تفارق دنيتي
جايز بالعتاب ترجع تاني تعمل حساب
لسنين فاتو ذكري حلوه و عمري وياك ابتدا
لو متهمنيش كان من بدري اسيبك و اعيش
ولا كنت ارجع ققول حبيبي مين هيبقي عليك كدا

english.title: Wake Up From What You're In
text: Wake up from what you're in, do something what are you waiting for
Go over things again my dear that's if our love is important to you
Whom loves whom, we've become strangers
If you're not worrying over what's between us, I won't worry about it
We are still in it, come on, change my view
And it's within your hands to remain my dear or to part my world
Maybe with reproach you'll return again and make consideration,
The years past are a nice memory and with you my life began
If you're not important to me, from early on I'd leave you and live
And I wouldn't return and say my dear, who would be like this over you

arabic.title: في حاجة فيك
text: في حاجه فيك معرفش اية هي
لا انت ملاك و مخبي عليا

english.title: It's something in you
text: It's something in you I don't know it
it makes you beautiful always in my eyes
when you are with me I forget the world
I think of you every time
I heard your voice call me
my heart beats it is appear in my eyes
this more than what I hope
I see the world like a paradise with your eyes
oh my love your talking is tender

english.title: Where is my laughter?
text: Won't you tell me where has it gone
and try the path of forgetfulness
like a wave between two shores

arabic.title: قالتلي قول
text: اول ما قولت بعيني كنت بحبها
دا ماضي فات من كام سنة
ومصدقاك ان انت عايش ليا انا
انا كنت فاكرة ان اول حب انا

english.title: She Told me to Say
text: whether I loved her or not
This is a story that is over
I don't know what good it will do us
It is a story that passed
And I forgot it, why do you remember it?
And I wish I'd said I didn't love her
Once I said with my eyes "I used to love you"
I felt like the word hurt her heart
I said: "What would I go on with now..?"
Oh my heart, how could you hurt her?
This is a story that is over
I don't know what good it will do us
It is a story that passed
And I forgot it, why do you remember it?
And I wish I'd said I didn't love her
that this is a past that has passed for years,
And I believe you when you say you've been living for me"
I told her: "Then why did you get upset?"
I used to think that I was your first love."
This is a story that is over
I don't know what good it will do us
It is a story that passed
And I forgot it, why do you remember it?
This is a story that is over
I don't know what good it will do us
It is a story that passed
And I forgot it, why do you remember it?
And I wish I'd said I didn't love her

arabic.title: قالك ندم
text: ده أنا اللي قولته علي يوم بعادنا
مثل يا طيب ولوم في طبعي وأغلط وعيب

english.title: She regrets
text: That's wrong to say, this talk is abused
Now that what I said about our breakup if it ever came in your imagination you would be shocked
Keep acting -good girl- and blame my personality, bad-mouth and disadvantage me
I only have one word for you
But how can I say it in public!
So she is returning in regret
Wants to talk about once upon a time!
She says I drove her away
It was a delusion that took me
And after my mind opened up, it rescued me
But take me out of your account

english.title: She says that she is regretful
text: She says that she is regretful
What I said about the day of our separation ;
If it gets through your mind, you will be shocked
Act, blame me, go wrong and laugh at me
I have only one word for you
But how can I say it ?
She says that she came back  regretful
And she thinks that I'm like old times
She says let the past come back
She says that I left her
She was an illusion that had taken me
And when my mind was opened, I was saved
That is something between you and yourself
Life for you is making mistakes and trying
And get me out of your plans

arabic.title: قاللي الوداع
text: كان قلبي ليه وقلبه مش ليا
حسيت اني لقيت حلم السنين وصحيت
حسيت اني لقيت حلم السنين وصحيت
كان قلبي ليه وقلبه مش ليا
حسيت اني لقيت حلم السنين وصحيت

english.title: She Said Goodbye
text: She said good bye and what can I say to her?
What is one supposed to say when it's time to say goodbye?
Why did I choose her and why did she choose me
My heart was for her and her heart wasn't for me
I felt like I found the dream of my life
Then I woke up and I was suddenly one of the wounded
I wish she said she was going away
And didn't say that she had a lover
I wish she left without hurting me
How will it benefit her to leave me wounded
I felt like I found the dream of my life
Then I woke up and I was suddenly one of the wounded
She said good bye and what can I say to her?
What is one supposed to say when it's time to say goodbye?
Why did I choose her and why did she choose me
My heart was for her and her heart wasn't for me
I felt like I found the dream of my life
Then I woke up and I was suddenly one of the wounded

when and how did this happen

english.title: In front of her mirror
text: In front of her mirror it's ok if she lingers, I'd wait for her asking her to hurry up, she smiles to me and I look at her
She chooses her colors asking me what I think of her dress, but how can I decide if she makes everything pretty
In front of her mirror it's ok if she lingers, I'd wait for her asking her to hurry up, she smiles to me and I look at her
She chooses her colors asking me what I think of her dress, but how can I decide if she makes everything pretty
With my eyes I see her the prettiest
She can linger as much as she likes as she's like no other
I don't want anyone else and I don't see no one else than her
It's that she is in my pupils
In front of her I'm weak
The way she talks is enough
I don't want anyone else and I don't see no one else

arabic.title: قصاد عینی
text: و بینا معاد، لو احنا بعاد
أکید راجع و لو بینی و بینه بلاد
و لا عمری أبیع لو مین قصاد عینی
و طول لیلی و لما بنام، قصاد عینی
فی یوم هنعود، ده بیننا وعود
و فی غیابه أکید لسه الأمل موجود

english.title: Before my Eyes
text: And we will inevitably meet someday, even though we are afar from each other
Surely she will return, even though there are lands between me and her
she stands before my eyes, everywhere
and we will surely return once again
I am melting in love and full of passion
And I would never give her up, no matter who stood before my eyes
And I cannot bear the days,
And my love cannot be described in words
And all through my nights and whenever I sleep, she is before my eyes
One day we will return, there are promises between us
And in her absence, hope is certainly still there

arabic.title: قلبي اتمناه
text: وانت ويايا ياما قولت ان شا لله
ياحبيبي ان شا لله، تبقى ليّا ان شا لله

english.title: My heart desired her
text: Being with me, many a time I repeated "God willing ......
... my love, you'll be mine. God willing"1
My heart desired her. Of all the (people of the) world it called (only) to her, it came (only) to her
Oh, God! Oh, Mighty God! Such beauty can never happen twice2
Who would bother or worry, while having that all,
about people or life? No no no
Being with me, many a time I repeated "God willing ......
... my love, you'll be mine. God willing"
I'll never forget her. This is a vow I take on myself and a word I will tighten up for her
From this day on I'll restart the past years of my life for her2

about people or life? No no no
Being with me, many a time I repeated "God willing ......
... my love, you'll be mine. God willing"

arabic.title: كنت في بالي
text: لسه انت كنت في بالي حالا من مفيش
من بعدي عايش ولا مش عارف تعيش
دا انا من كتير سبتك وحاسس انك انت مسبتنيش
ميهمنيش غير اللي سايب فينا مين
واحده النتيجه انا وانت طالعين خسرانين
وانا مش بخير زيك وبعدك كان هييجي الخير منين
فكره انك رحت مني مش قابلها شوف نهايه انا وانت غير دي نستاهلها
دا انت لو هتقول نسيت واسمعها منك برضو هعتبرك كانك مش قايلها
في ناس كتيره بتتهمني ف حبي ليك قالوا عشت بهمل نفسي وانا بهتم بيك
وانا اللي تاه بعدك وانا برضه اللي بيدور عليك
نسياني ليك صدقني مش هقدر عليه وانت مقاسمني في كل حلم حلمت بيه
وانساك بايه وانت مصاحبني في ميت طريق وانا ماشي فيه

english.title: You were on my mind
text: Out of a sudden, you were on my mind
Can you live while you're away from me or not?
I left you a while ago, but I still feel like you didn't leave me.
I don't care about who's the one who abandoned the other,
The result is that you and I both lost,
And I'm not doing fine, because after you the source of my joy is gone.
I can't stand the thought that you're gone
Please, find another ending we deserve
If you ever say the words "I forgot" and I hear them from you,
I'll still pretend you didn't say anything
There are many people that accuse me of my love for you
They said I've been neglecting myself as I took care of you
I'm the one who got lost after looking for you
Believe me, I won't be able to forget you
You tore me apart in every dream I dreamt
How can I forget you, when you're carrying me on a thousand paths I'm walking on?

arabic.title: كنت في بالي
text: لسه أنت كنت في بالي حالاً من مفيش
من بعدي عايش ولا مش عارف تعيش
ميهمنيش مين اللي سايب فينا مين
واحدة النتيجة أنا وأنت طالعين خسرانين
زيك وبعدك كان هيجي الخير منين
فكرة إنك روحت مني مش قابلها
شوف نهاية أنا وأنت غير دي نستاهلها
ده أنت لو هتقول نسيت وأسمعها منك
في ناس كتيرة بتتهمني في حبي ليك
قالوا عيشت بهمل نفسي وأنا بهتم بيك
وأنا اللي تاه بعدك وأنا برضه أللي بيدور عليك
نسياني ليك صدقني مش هقدر عليه
وأنت مقاسمني في كل حلم حلمت بيه
وأنت مصاحبي في ١٠٠ طريق وأنا ماشي فيه

english.title: I was thinking of you
text: I was thinking of you not so long ago
Whether you are alive after me or you can't live
It's that I left you so long ago yet I feel that you didn't leave me
I don't care who left the other
The outcome is the same, both of us came out losers
And I'm not well, just like you, how could there be any wellness after you
I'm not accepting the fact that I lost you
Come up with another ending that we both deserve
Even if I heard you saying that you forgot, I would still consider it not said
There are Many people blaming me
Saying that I neglected myself while I cared about you
And I'm the one who was lost after you, yet I'm the one looking for you
Believe me, I won't be able to forget about you
While you are sharing with me every dream I ever dreamed
And how can I forget you
While you are keeping me company in a hundred roads I'm walking in

text: You were in my mind from a little time

left you and feel like you didn't leave me

Even if you said that you forgot and I heard it from you
I will considered it like you didn't say anything
A lot of people accuse me in my love for you
They say that I lived ignoring myself and took care of you
And I'm the one who is stray after you and I'm the one who is searching for you
Forgetting you, believe me, I won't be able to do
As you sharing every dream I have dreamt about with me
With what I can forget you?
As you're walking with me in 100 way I am walking into

arabic.title: لفيتها بلاد
text: لفيتها بلاد شوفت كتير ديا و ديا

english.title: I've Been Around Countries
text: I've been around countries, I saw a lot of this and this
But I didn't find any more beautiful then an Arab girl
I've been around countries, I saw a lot of this and this
And my heart didnt lean to anyone but an Arab girl
She has magic and spirit no matter how far you go
From midst the countries of the world, you see her and say its her
She has magic for sure, that takes you far
From midst the countries of the world, you see her and say its her
She is one to be loved people, she's the one who filled my eyes
I saw many before her and I chose her
Her eyelashes kill and her laugh is cheeky

What should I describe her with, no matter what I say,
it's still only a little, if she goes on an angle I find the world has revolved with me

Your eyes remembered me with the past
And the nights of the past

of the wound of the illusions

english.title: How's she doing now
text: How's she doing now and who helped her pass the time. Tell me if it's best for her if I went and made up with her. I've wronged her and my heart broke hers. Shall I come now or not just yet.
Surely she has been silent, never talked, complained nor cried. I know her, she can be hurt and wronged, yet never shows. And if she sheds some tears, it's that she's really suffering.

Tell me if it's best for her, how can I meet and make up with her. Tell me if it's best for her, I'd go and make up with her. I've wronged her and my heart broke hers. Shall I come now or not just yet. And how's she doing now and who helped her pass the time.
For sure she's heartbroken and if she forgot all about me I'd understand. I'm the one who hurt her, tell her everything will be ok. But why tell her, I'm sure she feels me.

Tell me if it's best for her, how can I meet and make up with her. Tell me if it's best for her, I'd go and make up with her. I've wronged her and my heart broke hers. Shall I come now or not just yet. And how's she doing now and who helped her pass the time.

arabic.title: يا اجمل عيون

همسات صوتك، ضحكتك، تروا عطش روحي

english.title: What wonderful and pretty eyes
text: you awoke my yearning without any warning

your eyes like a sea in day and night
they have magic, my heart gets involved in them

your eyes are inspiring and you are a cure for my wound.
i swear i love you very much, i love Pisces
and i adore your details, your laugh, your crying, and your silence
because you're the whole world,nothing else matters.

You are the life to me and let anything else never be.

Your eye gazes are inspirational and you are the remedy to my wounds.

arabic.title: يا احلى حاجة
text: يا احلى حاجة ف عمري، انا نفسي احكيلك
عن احساسي، عن أشواقي، عن حبي و اعبّر
عن الحب اللي جوايا، ودنيا جديدة وحكاية
مجرد اني صادفتك، ومن ساعة مانا شوفتك
سنة ف حبك، سنة ف قربك
ولا أجمل ولا أغلى ولا أحلى
نسيت نفسي ف دنيا كلها أماني
رجعلي عمري المنسي، وليل الحب صحّاني
وحنين الشوق ف حبك مدوبني، مسهرني
مخليني أدوب واعشق، و أعيش واعشق
ولا قبلك ولا بعدك، موريني الحياة جنّة
دا الحب اللي جوايا، ودنيا جديدة وحكاية
مجرد اني صادفتك، ومن ساعة مانا شوفتك

english.title: O you, loveliest thing in my life
text: O you, loveliest1 thing in my life, I want to tell you
About my feeling, about my passion, about my love and and express
the love in me, the new life and the story2
once I met you and since I saw you
A whole year spent in love, a whole year spent beside you
Nothing can be lovelier nor  more precious nor sweeter
I've lost3 myself in a life of wishes
Regained my lost life again and the night of love made me stay it up
Night of love made me stay it up
And the longing of passion in your love is melting me, forcing me to stay night up,
making me melt and adore, live and adore.
None before you, nor after you4 will make me feel like in paradise
This is the love I hold in me, a new life and and a story2
once I met you and since I saw you

text: الحب لازم يتوه ف الاسم والعنوان

english.title: Oh Sea
text: Oh sea, why are you sad like this?
Oh shore, why are you hurt?
Are you crying for the ones who were treated unfairly
Or are you making hearts cry
when they don't know what's written in fate?
They are lost amidst the wind
This is the nature of humans
Oh sea, this is the nature of time
Well, as long as there are people
who hate to see the smile of others
Love will always be lost searching for the name and the address
And how can we think of tomorrow
When we can't escape the past
nor let go of all the sadness
It's a bizarre journey since its start
And it's our fate to continue it
And for the roses to live

the joy of our meetings the both of us , enjoying the world and everything inside of it
hey love melt us , let us enjoy and be happy

oh my good what a feeling of the passion while my eyes can see the most tender human
i gave up my heart and melted , i feel like i own the world when i own him\her
hey love melt us , let us enjoy and be happy
enlighten our nights , when we are together with our loved ones

ده انا قلبي بعد غيابك تاه

english.title: No, My Darling
text: How could I tell you to go
So that I didn’t care anymore
How could you believe that I would give up on us
Who would I feel for after you
How could a love of many years
End in the blink of an eye
My heart has been lost since you left
If we could forget the pain with words

How could you think I forgot
It said it to you out of pain
I meant to talk for a while
So maybe you would say something

Who would I feel for after you
How could a love of many years
End in the blink of an eye

text: اه على اللي في قلبي و عاللي

على كل لون م الحب و شاللي

english.title: Oh, My Friend
text: Oh my heart is full of so much
and my soul, for you, my friend
when the breeze of your love comes to me
I don't know what happens to me
Oh my flowers, oh my jasmines1
Oh my trees, oh my shadow
The first time I saw her, oh my soul
My wounds melted and I told her keep,
and go sing, oh my soul, and shine
Its warmth awakened, came to me and told me
It awoke my mind, my heart and my all
In my eyes, I kept for her
every color of love and she kept for me
And how could we think one day
that love and what has happened to me can be valueless?
and we are always love in itself
The sea of sadness and trouble is for
The one whose heart is black and is jealous
I am swimming in the midst of your sea
and I give you my affection, and I spoil you with beauty
The boat of our love is forever
And oh, the boat of the jealous people, do not set [here]

Look normal, natural to me not like that

I asked with whom I'm going to be

english.title: Dark One

To our lovers, it carry(fly) us,
And sadness never let us melt
And nor joyful(days) make us forget,
In the night of alienation, oh dark-one
Your love is like the breeze and the moon
I am your life, I am yourself
I am the one who longs(for you), and my birthday,
comes in your birthday, oh my song
In the night of alienation, oh dark-one
Your love is like the breeze and the moon
And the world of love is our world
Have they not slept when they remember you,
They stay all the night and they don't sleep because thy're longing for you
In the night of alienation, oh dark-one
Your love is like the breeze and the moon

text: لو قضى العمر معاك في عذاب

english.title: Oh Path
text: and to forget what is gone
Oh he who says he has repented is a liar,
[even] if he spends his entire life with you in suffering
Our names are planted in you,
as lanterns in the sky of your nights
Since we were young we live with you1
We love and long for you
We become happy when we find you
And we tell you, you are welcome!
In you we have knocked doors
And in you we lost friends
All our lives we have been all yours
We read the sadness in your eyes
And we go and treat you unfairly2
And we tell you, you are welcome!
And the people and you are our truth
Because of our love we melt in our passion for you
And [there are] hearts that live their entire lives calling you
And they tell you, you are welcome!

english.title: O you expatriated Bird
text: O you bird who's been estranged,
your Green house is  getting near,
After a journey that took its toll on you,
The sun of your day has risen,
Start again and give it a chance,
Guard your personality against your immaturity,
And don't change your sem·blance( guise ),
And Don't, in search of your income,
I fear for what I've built,
For I'll find you one day, gifting it all away from me,
And all my dreams will collapse,
Imagine that you're holding a wheat plant,
in the fields where they grow plenty,
for your country planted in you, qualities,
Truly believe the common saying that says,
will never hope to, one day,

Why did you go away from me

And you can feel my longing
Come back, my darling, I miss you
Come back, my darling, I miss you

Whoever has a laugh like this !
Whoever has extra ordinary eye color !
They yome here next to me, Come to me
I tell them what I have seen with my own eyes.
about this laugh (her laugh kills me)
about this look (her eye look kills me)
Oh God ! Oh God ! My eyes are fixated on her.
They learn, they try to mimic her
They would fail and get depressed
I will never let her away from my arms !
This beauty, I've seen it only once !
My eyes, My eyes are cold (not to envy her)!
on her who calmed the fire in my heart !

my expatriation ends, and I feel happy

about her missing her love, and coming back again?"
I say as I walk "what's the matter?

oh my thoughts don't manipulate me
and again, it won't be her!

my heart has been melted into the beats..
oh yearning, how painful you are!
my heart has been melted into the beats..

who u made us used to tenderness of love
why did u forget ! u sold us!

where were nostalgia lost from your hearts
guilt of loving hearts,why did u forget us

وهتقولي ايه ده اللي بيتغير اكيد بيبان عليه
مين اللي قدامي دا واحد معرفوش
مابقيتش اخاف عليه اسيبه او اجرحه
واهو كل واحد يعمل اللى يريحه
مين اللي قدامي دا واحد معرفوش
مابقيتش اخاف عليه اسيبه او اجرحه
واهو كل واحد يعمل اللى يريحه

english.title: Does it really matter to you
text: Does it really matter to you whether i die or live
That is non of your business
And what would you say, changes are evident
Who is it in front of me, that is someone i never knew
I no longer care if i leave or hurt him
Many lovers met and then were separated
What would you like to hear?
What is the use of that, go mind your own business
I forgave you for my heart's wound
Who is it in front of me, that is someone i never knew
I no longer care if i leave or hurt him
Many lovers met and then were separated

english.title: Why Do You Care
text: Why do you care if I live or die
What are you going to say, I will know if you were changing
Who are you, I don't know you
I don't care if you were hurt
What do you want to hear
Somethings to give you a piece of the mind
Why does it matters, see what have you done
Who are you, I don't know you
I don't care if you were hurt

arabic.title: يوم تلات
text: ع البساط بصات يا ناس عجبوني
كل ما أجي أقوم أقول خليني
أمشي م المكان ده ايه يمشيني
صعب أشوف ده غير غير في احلامي
كل عود وعود أحلى م التاني
قلبي لم يعود ليا من تاني
كان في إيدي عود قولت بيه أغاني
عشنا يوم جميل أحلى ما أتخيل

english.title: A Tuesday
text: On a Tuesday three girls called me
On the carpet I liked their looks
A setting and happiness and they bought me lunch
We ate together and they fascinated me
Shall I love the dark one
Or the white with the red cheeks
Life is sweet with the one with the sweet soul
Everytime I want to leave I tell myself to stay
Why should I leave this place!
The gathering of the beauties seduces me
Their hair is silk like flying in front of me
It's difficult to see something like that except for in my dreams
Their magic is dangerous what can I describe
A Tuesday equal to all my days
Their bodies are prettier than each other
My heart never came back to me
I had an AWD ( Arabic music instrument like a guitar) in my hands that I sang with
I'll wait for you in the morning my pretty
The talking took us until it got dark
We had a pretty good day prettier than I could ever imagine
One by one leaned over me
If I were to live here all my life it wouldn't be enough

arabic.title: يوم ما اتقابلنا
text: يوم ما اتقابلنا اليوم ده هفضل مش ناسيه
انا انكتبلي احلى قصة حب فيه
انا بوعدك الليالى دي هفضل معاك
انا بوعدك يا حبيبي يا اجمل ملاك
لو عزت نجمة من السما هجيبها ليك
كلمة بحبك اللي في عينيك قلتها
انا حتى فاكر اتقابلنا ازاي وفين
انا بوعدك الليالى دي هفضل معاك
انا بوعدك يا حبيبي يا اجمل ملاك
لو عزت نجمة من السما هجيبها ليك

english.title: The Day We Met
text: The day we met is a day i will never forget
I was destined to live the best love story ever
The first beautiful feelings that my heart felt
And the way i long to see you
I promise you, from tonight i'll always be with you
I'll cherish you and take care of you and do whatever you want me to do
I promise you my beautiful angel
If you needed a star from the sky, i'll bring it to you
The words ''I love you'' that i see in your eyes
And your smile that lights up my life when i say ''I love you too''
I remember exactly how and where we met
And the first words we said and the way your hand brushed mine
I promise you, from tonight i'll always be with you
I'll cherish you and take care of you and do whatever you want me to do
I promise you my beautiful angel
If you needed a star from the sky, i'll bring it to you

english.title: The Day We Met
text: The day we met is a day I will never forget
That day the most beautiful love story was written for me
My heart felt the first beautiful feelings
And my eagerness to meet after that
Tonight I promise you that I will stay with you
And I will do what makes you comfortable and watch over you
I promise you, my darling, the most beautiful angel
If you wanted a star from the sky I would bring it to you
The words "I love you" that you said with your eyes
And the happiness of the person who waited to hear its reply
I even remember how we met and where
And the first word between us and the handshake
Tonight I promise you that I will stay with you
And I will do what makes you comfortable and watch over you
I promise you, my darling, the most beautiful angel
If you wanted a star from the sky I would bring it to you

arabic.title: يومينهم
text: احنا فى حالنا وهما فى حالهم

arabic.title: حبيبى
text: حبيبى حبيبى حبيبى يا نور العين
آه حبيبى حبيبى حبيبى يا نور العين
حبيبى حبيبى حبيبى يا نور العين

اجمل عيون فى الكون انا شفتها
حبيبى حبيبى حبيبى يا نور العين

english.title: Darling
text: My darling, light of my eye, you live in my imagination
I've adored you for years with nobody else on my mind
Darling, darling, darling, light of my eye
Darling, darling, darling, light of my eye
Darling, darling, darling, light of my eye
Darling, darling, darling, light of my eye
The most beautiful eyes I've ever seen in the universe
God be with you and their magic
Your eyes are with me, your eyes are enough
My darling, light of my eye, you live in my imagination
I've adored you for years with nobody else on my mind
Your heart called out to me and said you love me
God be with you, you reassured me
With you is the beginning, with you is the whole story
I'm with you until the end
Darling, darling, darling, light of my eye
